oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Words in the Katkop dialect, from #kasin (B XXV. 2355-2360). 1) =kasin's and Dia!kwain's stories appear on the same page (2355) but were given at different times, 2) This story is found in Book XXV.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences: given by =kasin (Klaas Katkop) and Dia!kwain (David Hoesar)
